Get Stations

Source: R/get_stations.R
get_stations.Rd

Get Stations

Usage

get_stations(run_parallel = TRUE)

Arguments

run_parallel

default: TRUE

Value

list with general station "overview" (either as list "overview_list" or as data.frame "overview_df") and a crosstable with information which parameters is available per station ("x" if available, NA if not)

Examples

stations <- wasserportal::get_stations()
#> Importing 9 station overviews from Wasserportal Berlin ... ok. (8.80s) 
str(stations)
#> List of 3
